```{r}
library("rstan")
library("loo")
```

```{r}
data("Duncan")
mod1_data <- list(
  y = Duncan$prestige,
  n = nrow(Duncan)
)
X <- model.matrix(prestige ~ type + income + education, data = Duncan)
mod1_data$X <- X
mod1_data$k <- ncol(X)
mod1_data$b_loc <- 0
mod1_data$b_scale <- 1000
mod1_data$sigma_scale <- 50
```
